alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 8:30PM CDT until April 20 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. .Weekend rainfall over the Tombigbee River basin will result in water level rises. A flood warning is now in effect for the Tombigbee River. Another statement will be issued by Sunday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From late Monday night to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 87.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Tuesday morning to a crest of 101.3 feet Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
